General.Name: TV Thunder Public Company Limited
General.Description: TV Thunder Public Company Limited operates as a television production company in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Advertising Business; Services, Events and Television Programme Production Business; Artist Management Business; and Other Business. It produces, manages, and promotes television programs, music, series, and movies. The company also provides studio, event and artist management, and advertising services, as well as engages in the other sales promotion activities. In addition, it is involved in production and distribution of pocketbooks and advertising media. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
